description.narrative:
I november 2017 fick EU-delegationen i Kiev en förfrågan från den ukrainska skattemyndigheten, State Fiscal Service (SFS) om den kunde organisera en TADAT-mission (Tax Administration Diagnostic Assessment Tool) till Ukraina med uppgift att på ett objektivt sätt bedöma nyckelkomponenterna i Ukrainas system för skatteadministration. Efter en förfrågan från EU-delegationen utryckte Sverige ett intresse att delegera en TADAT-certifierad assessor från Skatteverket att delta i missionen.
Missionen till Ukraina kommer att äga rum mellan 12-26 februari 2018 och bestå av delegerade exeprter från Sverige, Nederländerna, USA, Tyskland, Frankrike och Litauen (observatör). Teamet kommer att ha möten med relevanta kollegor vid den ukrainska skattemyndigheten.

In November 2017 the EU Delegation to Kiev received a request from the State Fiscal Service of Ukraine (SFS) to consider organising a TADAT (Tax administration Diagnostic Assessment Tool) mission to Ukraine in February 2018. Sweden, upon the request of the EU Delegation to Kiev, Ukraine, expressed interest in delegating a certified TADAT assessor from the Swedish Tax Agency (Skatteverket) to participate in the mission.
TADAT is designed to provide an objective assessment of the health of key components of a country's tax administration. The mission to Ukraine will take place on 12-26 February 2018 and consist of experts delegated from the national tax authorities of Sweden, the Netherlands, the USA, Germany, France and Lithuania (observer). The assessment team would seek to meet relevant counterparts in the State Fiscal Service of Ukraine in both central and regional tax offices.

policy-marker.narrative: Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Convention on Biological Diversity
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Convention to Combat Desertification
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Adaptation
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Mitigation
Reproductive, Maternal, Newborn and Child Health (RMNCH)

description.narrative: The Embassy's assessment is that the Skatteverket participation in the TADAT mission to Ukraine on 12-26 February 2018 provided a valuable insights to the Embassy on a current state of play in tax area, as well as served as a good starting point for Skatteverket to explore the possibilities of institutional cooperation with the State Fiscal Service of Ukraine.
No indicator available - only a description of the activity results is published
